attributes.additional_details: The government should take action against pooing on trains as it is a hazard and also not nice for fellow passengers

rejection.details: It is not clear whether this is a call for a change in the use of passenger toilets on trains, or for action against those who defaecate elsewhere on the train.  Either way, this is primarily an issue for the train operating companies; if the petition is calling for a change in the use of toilets, it should make it clear that it is calling for the Government to change the provisions of franchises.
